DOC.brief_summary: This two part study evaluate efficacy early combine PDL ( pulse dye laser ) fractional photothermolysis cosmetic improvement post surgical scars.All subject offer time dermatologic procedure , option treat post surgical scar early combine PDL fractional photothermolysis . Part A non-randomized study design subject choice whether receive treatment . In part B , subject randomized 2:1 treatment vs. control design . The experimental group total 6 visit : 1 standard care suture removal visit , 3 treatment visit 2 follow visit . The control group 3 visit : 1 standard care suture removal visit 2 follow visit . Subjects currently live Chicago metropolitan area meet inclusion/exclusion criterion consider enrollment . This study pilot study design determine feasibility procedure .
